headline: YETI Announces CFO Transition
summary: Seasoned Finance and Retail Industry Executive Scott Bomar Appointed Chief Financial Officer; Mike McMullen to Transition After Serving 10 Years at YETIAUSTIN, Texas, Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- YETI Holdings, Inc. (“YETI”) (NYSE: YETI) today announced that Scott Bomar has been appointed Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer, effective February 23, 2026 (the “Effective Date”). Mr. Bomar succeeds Mike McMullen, who will cease to serve as YETI’s Chief Financial Officer
